message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $8,200. This is a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,800 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that $7,800 is still a bit below your target price, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $8,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
